text: Gholam Hosein Shiri Aliabad (; 30 April 1961 – 3 August 2021) was an Iranian politician. He was born in Hashtrud, Iran. He was a member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly from 2012 until 2016. Shiri Aliabad died on 3 August 2021 of COVID-19 in Tehran, aged 60.نماینده سابق هشترود در مجلس بر اثر کرونا درگذشت ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tehran Category:Iranian politicians
title: Gholam Hosein Shiri Aliabad
